### Icons in chunk

```{r}
  icon_fa('star')
  icon_fa('star', class = 'fa-xs')
  icon_fa('star', iconstyle = 'far', class = 'fa-5x')
  icon_fa('spinner', class = 'fa-pulse')
  icon_fa('magic', class = 'fa-5x')
  icon_fa('magic', class = 'fa-5x', transform = 'rotate-90', style = 'color:Tomato')
```
